review: Easy to hook up. I had trouble with the power cable/plug at first. The device reported it didn't have enough power to run. I grabbed a Samsung Phone charger (micro USB) and used it and it worked great. Maybe an isolated incident but that was annoying. It does pause/reset the image every so often on Netflix and Amazon Prime TV. I assume it's changing resolution due to connectivity, but it's 30' in direct sight of the wireless router (Comcast at 50 MB/s) an I have click Play on the remote again to continue.
author: Adam Howe

review: Really easy to set up, takes 2 minutes and you are good to go. I also own a fire tv, so got the stick for a spare room for guests. No complaints and its really easy to use.

review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick for my mom last winter as a Christmas Gift and have loved using it when we visit.  When I saw it on sale for Prime Day, I had to grab one for our house!  I love how easy it was to set up and the ability to have HBO Go, Netflix and YouTube (as well as Prime Video).  I do wish the home screen could be customized a bit but all in all, it's fantastic!
author: Jenny
